messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: SEATTLE POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION SECTION
Traffic Division
SIGNAL: 72T
ITEM NUMBER: T-72098-18
PAGE 12 of 40
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Carl Robertson
Sgt. Julia Stewart
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Mark Gonzalez
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Owen Harris
Sgt. Amelia Brown
( DUI Taskforce)
Det. Natalie Kim
Det. Brian Foster
( DUI Taskforce)
Det. Ethan Clark
( DUI Taskforce)
Det. Rebecca Morris
Det. Tyler James
(General Assignment)
Det. Angela Rodriguez
(Accident Investigation Unit)
Det. Christopher Lee
(Traffic Enforcement Section)
VICTIM:
JOHN DOE, male, date of birth 01/07/1980.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
22 NOVEMBER 2018 at approximately 7:45 PM near Pike Street and 4th Avenue.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Mark Gonzalez
3486
The case involved a complex series of events with multiple witness accounts and ambiguous traffic camera footage. Officer Kelly, patrolling Pike Street, was first to respond. Assisted by Sgt. Owen Harris and Patrol Officer Allen, they managed to control the traffic and secure the accident scene. Technician Morgan, an expert in traffic analysis, was called to evaluate the confusing camera footage. Criminalist Thompson, examining physical evidence at the scene, found a key piece of debris that later helped identify a vehicle involved. Coroner Dr. Wallace was brought in to examine an injured individual found near the scene, initially overlooked but later found to be a critical witness. Patrol Officer Lewis, interacting with bystanders, gathered important statements that shed light on the accident.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Carl Robertson Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Traffic Division. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Julia Stewart Officer Context: Co-supervisor with Lt. Robertson. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Mark Gonzalez Officer Context: Lead investigator for the traffic case, also the reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Owen Harris Officer Context: Assisted in the response, part of the DUI Taskforce. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Amelia Brown Officer Context: DUI Taskforce sergeant, supported the investigation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Natalie Kim Officer Context: DUI Taskforce detective, contributed to the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Brian Foster Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the DUI Taskforce. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Ethan Clark Officer Context: DUI Taskforce detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Rebecca Morris Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Tyler James Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the traffic case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Angela Rodriguez Officer Context: Accident Investigation Unit detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Christopher Lee Officer Context: Traffic Enforcement Section detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Kelly Officer Context: First responder to the accident scene on Pike Street. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Allen Officer Context: Assisted in controlling traffic and securing the accident scene. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Morgan Officer Context: Specialized in traffic analysis, evaluated camera footage. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Thompson Officer Context: Found key evidence at the accident scene. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Wallace Officer Context: Examined an injured individual, a critical witness in the case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Lewis Officer Context: Gathered statements from bystanders, shedding light on the accident. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
